name: XRViewer
description: This plugin template uses Typescript. If you are familiar with Javascript, Typescript will look very familiar. In fact, valid Javascript code is already valid Typescript code.

scripts.dev: npm-run-all -l -p dev:xrviewer build:watch_p_xrviewer build:watch_p_webxr build:watch_p_unity build:watch_p_gltf
scripts.build:all: npm-run-all -l -p build:xrviewer build:plugin_xrviewer build:plugin_webxr build:plugin_unity build:plugin_gltf
scripts.release: rm XRViewer/code.js && rm XRViewer/ui.html && rm XRViewer_WebXR/code.js && rm XRViewer_WebXR/ui.html && rm XRViewer_Unity/code.js && rm XRViewer_Unity/ui.html && rm XRViewer_GLTF/code.js && rm XRViewer_GLTF/ui.html && rm -rf release && mkdir release && echo all files cleaned && npm run build:plugin_xrviewer && npm run build:plugin_webxr && npm run build:plugin_unity && npm run build:plugin_gltf && rm XRViewer/ui.js.LICENSE.txt && rm XRViewer_WebXR/ui.js.LICENSE.txt && rm XRViewer_Unity/ui.js.LICENSE.txt && rm XRViewer_GLTF/ui.js.LICENSE.txt && echo build finished && bestzip release/XRViewer.zip XRViewer/* && bestzip release/XRViewer_WebXR.zip XRViewer_WebXR/* && bestzip release/XRViewer_Unity.zip XRViewer_Unity/* && bestzip release/XRViewer_GLTF.zip XRViewer_GLTF/* && echo figma plugin zipped && bestzip release/mac_script.zip cli/mac_script/* && echo mac script zipped && bestzip release/win_script.zip cli/win_script/* && echo win script zipped && dotenv release-it --ci --github.autoGenerate
